languages.text: Вскоре в Просторе разражается скандал — были опубликованы доказательства того, что Леди Теодора промышляла грабежом судов и колоний конкурентов. Репутация династии измарана.
Soon the Expanse is shaken by scandalous evidence proving that Lady Theodora plundered ships and colonies that belonged to her rivals. The dynasty's reputation has been sullied.
languages.original_text: Вскоре в Просторе разражается скандал — были опубликованы доказательства того, что Леди Теодора промышляла грабежом судов и колоний конкурентов. Репутация династии измарана.

traits.locale_text: Soon the Expanse is shaken by scandalous evidence proving that Lady Theodora plundered ships and colonies belonging to her rivals. The dynasty's reputation has been sullied.
The unidentified agents easily escape your enforcers, leaving behind a sense of dark mystery.

Soon the Expanse is shaken by scandalous evidence proving that Lady Theodora plundered ships and colonies belonging to her rivals. The dynasty's reputation has been sullied.

languages.text: Bientôt, les Étendues sont ébranlées par une révélation scandaleuse attestant que dame Théodora a pillé nombre de vaisseaux et colonies appartenant à ses rivales. La réputation de la dynastie en ressort durablement ternie.
languages.original_text: Soon the Expanse is shaken by scandalous evidence proving that Lady Theodora plundered ships and colonies belonging to her rivals. The dynasty's reputation has been sullied.

traits.locale_text: Bientôt, les Étendues sont ébranlées par une révélation scandaleuse attestant que dame Théodora a pillé nombre de vaisseaux et colonies appartenant à ses rivales. La réputation de la dynastie en ressort durablement ternie.

languages.text: やがて、シオドーラ様が敵対勢力の船やコロニーを略奪したことを証明するスキャンダラスな証拠によって、エクスパンスは揺れ動く。王朝の評判は地に落ちた。
languages.original_text: Soon the Expanse is shaken by scandalous evidence proving that Lady Theodora plundered ships and colonies belonging to her rivals. The dynasty's reputation has been sullied.

traits.locale_text: やがて、シオドーラ様が敵対勢力の船やコロニーを略奪したことを証明するスキャンダラスな証拠によって、エクスパンスは揺れ動く。王朝の評判は地に落ちた。

languages.text: 没过多久，某个消息震动了整个科罗努斯扩区。有人公开了证据，证明西奥多拉夫人掠夺了其他行商浪人的舰船与殖民地，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的名誉也因此蒙辱。
languages.original_text: Soon the Expanse is shaken by scandalous evidence proving that Lady Theodora plundered ships and colonies belonging to her rivals. The dynasty's reputation has been sullied.

traits.locale_text: 没过多久，某个消息震动了整个科罗努斯扩区。有人公开了证据，证明西奥多拉夫人掠夺了其他行商浪人的舰船与殖民地，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的名誉也因此蒙辱。

languages.text: La Extensión pronto se ve sacudida por la revelación de que lady Theodora saqueaba las naves y colonias de sus rivales. La reputación de la dinastía está por los suelos.
languages.original_text: Soon the Expanse is shaken by scandalous evidence proving that Lady Theodora plundered ships and colonies belonging to her rivals. The dynasty's reputation has been sullied.

traits.locale_text: La Extensión pronto se ve sacudida por la revelación de que lady Theodora saqueaba las naves y colonias de sus rivales. La reputación de la dinastía está por los suelos.

languages.text: Bald wird die Ausdehnung von skandalösen Beweisen erschüttert, dass Lady Theodora regelmäßig Schiffe und Kolonien ihrer Rivalen geplündert hat. Der Ruf der Dynastie ist besudelt.
languages.original_text: Soon the Expanse is shaken by scandalous evidence proving that Lady Theodora plundered ships and colonies belonging to her rivals. The dynasty's reputation has been sullied.

traits.locale_text: Bald wird die Ausdehnung von skandalösen Beweisen erschüttert, dass Lady Theodora regelmäßig Schiffe und Kolonien ihrer Rivalen geplündert hat. Der Ruf der Dynastie ist besudelt.

languages.text: Enginlik, çok geçmeden Leydi Theodora'nın rakiplerine ait gemileri ve kolonileri yağmaladığını gösteren utanç verici bir kanıtla çalkalanıyor. Hanedanlığın itibarına gölge düşüyor.
languages.original_text: Soon the Expanse is shaken by scandalous evidence proving that Lady Theodora plundered ships and colonies belonging to her rivals. The dynasty's reputation has been sullied.
